markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />Interact ([visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163))   **Requirements** The  mirror robe  was last activated to divert attention away from you and you are  hidden  or  undetected  by at least one foe; **Effect** You draw attention toward yourself. Choose one foe to which you were hidden or undetected. You reveal yourself to all, becoming [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27). The foe you chose diverts its attention to you, becoming [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to your allies until the beginning of your next turn. If you are [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) or otherwise can't become observed, you can't use this activation.
